## SendableLiquity.approveCollateral() method

Allow Liquity to use the collateral token. [staking](./lib-base.transactableliquity.stakeunitokens.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
approveCollateral(allowance?: Decimalish): Promise<SentLiquityTransaction<S, LiquityReceipt<R, void>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  allowance | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum amount of collateral tokens that will be transferrable to liquidity (<code>2^256 - 1</code> by default). |

Promise&lt;[SentLiquityTransaction](./lib-base.sentliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [LiquityReceipt](./lib-base.liquityreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;
